name: Honey-Balsamic Chicken
author: BAGRUBA
summary: Short on ingredients, this marinated chicken bakes up tender and flavorful. It's good enough for company. Serve with rice and salad to complete the meal.
ingredients: 2 pounds bone-in chicken thighs, or more to taste
directions: Beat balsamic vinegar, olive oil, honey, thyme, and rosemary together in a bowl until smooth; pour marinade into a resealable plastic bag
Season chicken thighs with salt and black pepper; add to marinade in plastic bag
Squeeze bag to remove air and seal
Marinate chicken in refrigerator for 2 to 8 hours
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Pour chicken and marinade into a baking dish
Bake chicken in preheated oven until no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, 35 to 40 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
